Entries.DialogueText: Ahoy there! It's nice to see young folk movin' in to the valley. It's not very common these days.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ahoy there! It's nice to see young folk movin' in to the valley. It's not very common these days.

Entries.DialogueText: By the stem o' me pipe... a cup o' Stardrop Tea! And here I thought it was only the stuff of mermaid legend. Thank you kindly.
Entries.DisplayPattern: By the stem o' me pipe... a cup o' Stardrop Tea! And here I thought it was only the stuff of mermaid legend. Thank you kindly.

Entries.DialogueText: Aye... A timeless classic. Brings a tear to me eye, with every read. A fisherman can never have too many copies! Thank ye. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye... A less classic. Brings a tear to me eye, with every read. A fisherman can never have too many copies! Thank ye.

Entries.DialogueText: Thank ye! This'll be perfect winter reading. Ah, and it even smells of the sea... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thank ye! This'll be perfect winter reading. Ah, and it even smells of the sea...

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, 'Bait And Bobber'... Every angler ought to have a subscription, but it costs a pretty penny. Taught me a lot of good fishin' tips over the years. Thanks! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, 'Bait And Bobber'... Every angler ought to have a subscription, but it costs a pretty penny. Taught me a lot of good fishin' tips over the years. Thanks!

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, this stuff warms the ol' bones. Thank you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, this stuff warms the ol' bones. Thank you.

Entries.DialogueText: Aye... I hope these weird rains don't bother the fish... It could ruin me life!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye... I hope these weird rains don't bother the fish... It could ruin me life!

Entries.DialogueText: Well, the fish seem as healthy as ever. In fact, I swear they've been biting with extra vigor!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, the fish seem as healthy as ever. In fact, I swear they've been biting with extra vigor!

Entries.DialogueText: If the fish like these rains, then I like 'em, too.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If the fish like these rains, then I like 'em, too.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... That's the perfect bait for a catfish I've been tryin' to catch!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... That's the perfect bait for a catfish I've been tryin' to catch!

Entries.DialogueText: Here, let me trade you this for it. I'm not sure what it is, but it washed up on the beach not too long ago.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, let me trade you this for it. I'm not sure what it is, but it washed up on the beach not too long ago.

Entries.DialogueText: Somethin' tells me you could use it, lad.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Somethin' tells me you could use it, lad.

Entries.DialogueText: Somethin' tells me you could use it, miss.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Somethin' tells me you could use it, miss.

Entries.DialogueText: The horror! ...What kind of monster is this?
Entries.DisplayPattern: The horror! ...What kind of monster is this?

Entries.DialogueText: *chomp*... Yep, that's real gold alright. Heh! What a gift! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *chomp*... Yep, that's real gold alright. Heh! What a gift!

Entries.DialogueText: Giving up the bachelor life, eh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Giving up the bachelor life, eh?

Entries.DialogueText: Giving up the single life, eh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Giving up the single life, eh?

Entries.DialogueText: Just don't forget to make time for fishing...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just don't forget to make for fishing...

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, you caught the Angler, did ya? A good 'first step' into the world o' rare fish, that one.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, you caught the Angler, did ya? A good 'first step' into the world o' rare fish, that one.

Entries.DialogueText: So, you finally conquered the Crimsonfish! That fish has been taunting me for many years. He nearly nibbled through the wood under me house!
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, you finally conquered the Crimsonfish! That fish has been taunting me for many years. He nearly nibbled through the wood under me house!

Entries.DialogueText: By the stem o' me pipe... You actually caught 'the Legend'. I never thought I'd see the day... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: By the stem o' me pipe... You actually caught 'the Legend'. I never thought I'd see the day...

Entries.DialogueText: Well, lad, you've done it... You're the best fisherman this valley's seen in a long time... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, lad, you've done it... You're the best fisherman this valley's seen in a long ...

Entries.DialogueText: Well, miss, you've done it... You're the best angler this valley's seen in a long time... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, miss, you've done it... You're the best angler this valley's seen in a long ...

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, so you finally snagged the Glacierfish... That's one of the slipperiest fish I've ever encountered!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, so you finally snagged the Glacierfish... That's one of the slipperiest fish I've ever encountered!

Entries.DialogueText: How many tries did it take ya?
Entries.DisplayPattern: How many tries did it take ya?

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff* *sniff*... Something tells me you've been fishin' in the sewers, lad.
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff* *sniff*... Something tells me you've been fishin' in the sewers, lad.

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff* *sniff*... Something tells me you've been fishin' in the sewers, miss.
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff* *sniff*... Something tells me you've been fishin' in the sewers, miss.

Entries.DialogueText: It's an unconventional approach, to be sure. There's legend of gargantuan carp, twisted into monsters from the toxic sludge...
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's an unconventional approach, to be sure. There's legend of gargantuan carp, twisted into monsters from the toxic sludge...

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff*... Ah... That old familiar scent. You've been raisin' crabs, haven't ya?
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff*... Ah... That old familiar scent. You've been raisin' crabs, haven't ya?

Entries.DialogueText: Yer a man after me own heart, {Farmer_Name}. Hah! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yer a man after me own heart, . Hah!

Entries.DialogueText: Yer a lady after me own heart, {Farmer_Name}. Hah! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yer a lady after me own heart, . Hah!

Entries.DialogueText: Here, take this. I found it on the beach... Been savin' it fer a special occasion. It's not every day I discover a fellow crab enthusiast! [797]
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, take this. I found it on the beach... Been savin' it fer a special occasion. It's not every day I discover a fellow crab enthusiast!

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... a movie. That's kind of ye, lad.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... a movie. That's kind of ye, lad.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... a movie. That's kind of ye, miss.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... a movie. That's kind of ye, miss.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll just finish me pipe, and head over.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll just finish me pipe, and head over.

Entries.DialogueText: Tomorrow is the annual Trout Derby... Aye, it's a freshwater enthusiast's dream!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Tomorrow is the annual Trout Derby... Aye, it's a freshwater enthusiast's dream!

Entries.DialogueText: Anglers from all over the world will be here to catch our beautiful Rainbow Trout...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Anglers from all over the world will be here to catch our beautiful Rainbow Trout...

Entries.DialogueText: I'd better see you out there, lad! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd better see you out there, lad!

Entries.DialogueText: I hope to see you out there! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope to see you out there!

Entries.DialogueText: For the next two days, I'll only be manning the shop for one hour, starting at 9am. So if you really need somethin', you can come by then.
Entries.DisplayPattern: For the next two days, I'll only be manning the shop for one hour, starting at 9am. So if you really need somethin', you can come by then.

Entries.DialogueText: It's the big day! I've got all me equipment tuned to catch Trout...
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's the big day! I've got all me equipment tuned to catch Trout...

Entries.DialogueText: Good luck out there!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good luck out there!

Entries.DialogueText: How's the Derby treatin' ya so far?
Entries.DisplayPattern: How's the Derby treatin' ya so far?

Entries.DialogueText: I've found plenty o' Golden Tags, meself... but it's not over yet!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've found plenty o' Golden Tags, meself... but it's not over yet!

Entries.DialogueText: Tomorrow, at the beach, is the start of a little gathering... called 'SquidFest'.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Tomorrow, at the beach, is the start of a little gathering... called 'SquidFest'.

Entries.DialogueText: Aye... tis' a difficult catch, the squid. But I trust that you've developed a knack for the sport, by now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye... tis' a difficult catch, the squid. But I trust that you've developed a knack for the sport, by now.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't give up just yet! There's more squid in these waters...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't give up just yet! There's more squid in these waters...

Entries.DialogueText: It warms me ol' winter heart to see all these anglers gathered here, all for the love o' fishing... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It warms me ol' winter heart to see all these anglers gathered here, all for the love o' fishing...

Entries.DialogueText: Ahoy there, son.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ahoy there, son.

Entries.DialogueText: Ahoy there, lass.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ahoy there, lass.

Entries.DialogueText: Looks like decent weather for fishing, eh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Looks like decent weather for fishing, eh?

Entries.DialogueText: Have you had much luck in the local waters? You look like you could be a strong angler if you set your mind to it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you had much luck in the local waters? You look like you could be a strong angler if you set your mind to it.

Entries.DialogueText: A true angler has respect for the water... don't you forget that.
Entries.DisplayPattern: A true angler has respect for the water... don't you forget that.

Entries.DialogueText: The ol' Man was a fisherman, you know. I grew up sailing between the fern islands, living from catch to catch.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The ol' Man was a fisherman, you know. I grew up sailing between the fern islands, living from catch to catch.

Entries.DialogueText: The fishing life is tough, but there's something about it that keeps you goin'.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The fishing life is tough, but there's something about it that keeps you goin'.

Entries.DialogueText: Some fish come and go with the seasons. Others only come out at night or in the rain.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Some fish come and go with the s. Others only come out at night or in the rain.

Entries.DialogueText: I've heard a rumor that a special kind of fish can be found in the pools between waterfalls...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've heard a rumor that a special kind of fish can be found in the pools between waterfalls...

Entries.DialogueText: If you can reach it with yer rod, that is...
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you can reach it with yer rod, that is...

Entries.DialogueText: *mumble* *mumble* ...Eh? I would tell you about my thoughts, but it's a fisherman's secret.
Entries.DisplayPattern: *mumble* *mumble* ...Eh? I would tell you about my thoughts, but it's a fisherman's secret.

Entries.DialogueText: There's rumors of some very rare fish in these parts... but only an experienced angler could stand a chance against them.
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's rumors of some very rare fish in these parts... but only an experienced angler could stand a chance against them.

Entries.DialogueText: You'll need the finest bait you can get if you want a rare fish to bite.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You'll need the finest bait you can get if you want a rare fish to bite.

Entries.DialogueText: If you really want to get the fish biting, make sure you put some bait on your hook.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you really want to get the fish biting, make sure you put some bait on your hook.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm a simple man... when my pipe is full, I'm happy. When my pipe is empty... well, then I just fill 'er up again. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm a simple man... when my pipe is full, I'm happy. When my pipe is empty... well, then I just fill 'er up again.

Entries.DialogueText: If the local fishing scene got a bit more lively, I might expand the shop's stock.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If the local fishing scene got a bit more lively, I might expand the shop's stock.

Entries.DialogueText: How's the fishing life going for ya?
Entries.DisplayPattern: How's the fishing life going for ya?

Entries.DialogueText: I try to fish as often as possible, but it's not easy when you've got a shop to run.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I try to fish as often as possible, but it's not easy when you've got a shop to run.

Entries.DialogueText: If you purchase a high quality fishing rod, you'll be able to attach bait and tackle to the line.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you purchase a high quality fishing rod, you'll be able to attach bait and tackle to the line.

Entries.DialogueText: Bait causes fish to bite faster. Tackle can make your job a lot easier when reeling fish in.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Bait causes fish to bite faster. Tackle can make your job a lot easier when reeling fish in.

Entries.DialogueText: There's all kinds of tackle, with different perks. They're usually a little flimsy, so don't be surprised if your tackle breaks after a while.
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's all kinds of tackle, with different perks. They're usually a little flimsy, so don't be surprised if your tackle breaks after a while.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, it's my skipper, {Farmer_Name}! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, it's my skipper, !

Entries.DialogueText: I'd give you a discount on bait if I could afford it. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd give you a discount on bait if I could afford it.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't have high hopes of winning... the fish look nice but they don't exactly smell great... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't have high hopes of winning... the fish look nice but they don't exactly smell great...

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, I got a low score. I guess Mayor Lewis isn't much of a fish man. Oh well... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, I got a low score. I guess Mayor Lewis isn't much of a fish man. Oh well...

Entries.DialogueText: Good morning, lad!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good morning, lad!

Entries.DialogueText: Good morning, miss!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good morning, miss!

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry to bother you so early, but, eh... I've noticed you haven't been fishing much.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry to bother you so early, but, eh... I've noticed you haven't been fishing much.

Entries.DialogueText: Aye... it can be difficult to get into the sport, for a beginner.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye... it can be difficult to get into the sport, for a beginner.

Entries.DialogueText: So, I figured I'd give you a few pointers... maybe it'll help you develop yer sea legs!
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, I figured I'd give you a few pointers... maybe it'll help you develop yer sea legs!

Entries.DialogueText: So, you'll want to hold the rod like this, see?...
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, you'll want to hold the rod like this, see?...

Entries.DialogueText: Willy gave you a quick lesson on fishing basics.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Willy gave you a quick lesson on fishing basics.

Entries.DialogueText: You feel more confident already!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You feel more confident already!

Entries.DialogueText: One more thing... I wanted to give you this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: One more thing... I wanted to give you this.

Entries.DialogueText: It's called a 'training rod'. It should make catching fish a lot easier.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's called a 'training rod'. It should make catching fish a lot easier.

Entries.DialogueText: Just be aware that you'll only be able to catch basic fish with this. But it's a great way to develop your skills early on!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just be aware that you'll only be able to catch basic fish with this. But it's a great way to develop your skills early on!

Entries.DialogueText: I hope you'll give fishing another try. Once you get the hang of it, you'll be having a great time.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope you'll give fishing another try. Once you get the hang of it, you'll be having a great .

Entries.DialogueText: Good luck out there! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good luck out there!

Entries.DialogueText: Me?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Me?

Entries.DialogueText: Hehe... That I do. We showed up one morning and the place was crawlin' with 'em. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hehe... That I do. We showed up one morning and the was crawlin' with 'em.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm...

Entries.DialogueText: The mushrooms are a tad chewier than last year...
Entries.DisplayPattern: The mushrooms are a tad chewier than last year...

Entries.DialogueText: Aye, lad
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye, lad

Entries.DialogueText: Ahoy there, son. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ahoy there, son.

Entries.DialogueText: Ahoy there, miss. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ahoy there, miss.

Entries.DialogueText: Heard there was a newcomer in town... Good to finally meet ya. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heard there was a newcomer in town... Good to finally meet ya.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... I'm still tryin' to unwind from a month out on the salty seas... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... I'm still tryin' to unwind from a month out on the salty seas...

Entries.DialogueText: It was a big haul! I sold a lot of good fish.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It was a big haul! I sold a lot of good fish.

Entries.DialogueText: Finally saved enough to buy me a new rod. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Finally saved enough to buy me a new rod.

Entries.DialogueText: Here, I want you to have my old fishing rod. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, I want you to have my old fishing rod.

Entries.DialogueText: It's important to me that the art o' fishing stays alive. And hey, maybe you'll buy somethin' from the shop once in a while. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's important to me that the art o' fishing stays alive. And hey, maybe you'll buy somethin' from the shop once in a while.

Entries.DialogueText: There's good water here in the valley. All kinds o' fish.
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's good water here in the valley. All kinds o' fish.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh yeah. My shop's back open now, so come by if you need supplies. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh yeah. My shop's back open now, so come by if you need supplies.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll also buy anything you catch.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll also buy anything you catch.

Entries.DialogueText: 'If it smells, it sells'. Heh heh. That's what my ol' Pappy used to say, anyway. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 'If it smells, it sells'. Heh heh. That's what my ol' Pappy used to say, anyway.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... it's a good thing you turned up, lad.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... it's a good thing you turned up, lad.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... It's a good thing you turned up, miss.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... It's a good thing you turned up, miss.

Entries.DialogueText: I've got a... a bit of a problem I could use a hand with...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've got a... a bit of a problem I could use a hand with...

Entries.DialogueText: Er... It'd be best if I just showed ya...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Er... It'd be best if I just showed ya...

Entries.DialogueText: Take a deep breath, now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Take a deep breath, now.

Entries.DialogueText: As you can see...
Entries.DisplayPattern: As you can see...

Entries.DialogueText: And smell... heh...
Entries.DisplayPattern: And smell... heh...

Entries.DialogueText: The old girls 'ran wild' last night... heh... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The old girls 'ran wild' last night... heh...

Entries.DialogueText: My experiment needs a little work...
Entries.DisplayPattern: My experiment needs a little work...

Entries.DialogueText: Aye...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye...

Entries.DialogueText: Aye... These are the finest, meatiest crabs you'll ever set yer eyes on. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye... These are the finest, meatiest crabs you'll ever set yer eyes on.

Entries.DialogueText: They be a little too feisty, though... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: They be a little too feisty, though...

Entries.DialogueText: Goodbye, me sweet ladies... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Goodbye, me sweet ladies...

Entries.DialogueText: Hehe... they love it... Look at 'em go! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hehe... they love it... Look at 'em go!

Entries.DialogueText: Ahoy!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ahoy!

Entries.DialogueText: I was just thinkin' of you, lad.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was just thinkin' of you, lad.

Entries.DialogueText: I was just thinkin' of you, miss.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was just thinkin' of you, miss.

Entries.DialogueText: This bug meat you found is perfect!
Entries.DisplayPattern: This bug meat you found is perfect!

Entries.DialogueText: Hehe... When I said 'fresh', I didn't expect it to still be wrigglin'!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hehe... When I said 'fresh', I didn't expect it to still be wrigglin'!

Entries.DialogueText: But I'm not complaining! The fish love it... Hehehe... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I'm not complaining! The fish love it... Hehehe...

Entries.DialogueText: As a way of saying 'thanks', I wanted to teach you an old fisherman's secret... My ol' Pappy taught me this on a fishing trip many years ago.
Entries.DisplayPattern: As a way of saying 'thanks', I wanted to teach you an old fisherman's secret... My ol' Pappy taught me this on a fishing trip many years ago.

Entries.DialogueText: Learned how to craft 'Quality Bobber'
Entries.DisplayPattern: Learned how to craft 'Quality Bobber'

Entries.DialogueText: Using that bobber will attract higher quality fish.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Using that bobber will attract higher quality fish.

Entries.DialogueText: That means more money in yer pocket, lad. Hehe... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That means more money in yer pocket, lad. Hehe...

Entries.DialogueText: That means more money in yer pocket, lass. Hehe... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That means more money in yer pocket, lass. Hehe...

Entries.DialogueText: Got one!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Got one!

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, .

Entries.DialogueText: It's odd... I'm not sure what caused this boulder to disappear.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's odd... I'm not sure what caused this boulder to disappear.

Entries.DialogueText: This stream is flowing from deep within the mountain.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This stream is flowing from deep within the mountain.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey! Do you see that glistening in the water?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey! Do you see that glistening in the water?

Entries.DialogueText: Yes... that's quality ore! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yes... that's quality ore!

Entries.DialogueText: The flow of water must be carrying it out of the mountain.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The flow of water must be carrying it out of the mountain.

Entries.DialogueText: You know what this means, right?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know what this means, right?

Entries.DialogueText: It means we can start panning for ore! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It means we can start panning for ore!

Entries.DialogueText: Here, I've got an extra pan in my backpack... why don't you take it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, I've got an extra pan in my backpack... why don't you take it?

Entries.DialogueText: If you ever see ore glistening in the water, use that pan and see what you find.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you ever see ore glistening in the water, use that pan and see what you find.

Entries.DialogueText: Got one, lad!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Got one, lad!

Entries.DialogueText: Ahoy!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ahoy!

Entries.DialogueText: Come in... make yourself at home...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Come in... make yourself at home...

Entries.DialogueText: Aye... that's good stuff, there. The fish go crazy for it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye... that's good stuff, there. The fish go crazy for it.

Entries.DialogueText: Just... eh... make sure to wash yer hands good after dipping them in those juices... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just... eh... make sure to wash yer hands good after dipping them in those juices...

Entries.DialogueText: The aroma has been known to linger for up to seven weeks, lad...
Entries.DisplayPattern: The aroma has been known to linger for up to seven weeks, lad...

Entries.DialogueText: The aroma has been known to linger for up to seven weeks, miss...
Entries.DisplayPattern: The aroma has been known to linger for up to seven weeks, miss...

Entries.DialogueText: So... you been catching a lot o' fish?
Entries.DisplayPattern: So... you been catching a lot o' fish?

Entries.DialogueText: Aha! A man after me own heart... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aha! A man after me own heart...

Entries.DialogueText: Aha! A lady after me own heart... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aha! A lady after me own heart...

Entries.DialogueText: You can always trust a fisherman...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can always trust a fisherman...

Entries.DialogueText: You can always count on a lady who fishes...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can always count on a lady who fishes...

Entries.DialogueText: That's what me ol' Pappy used to say, at least. Haha! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's what me ol' Pappy used to say, at least. Haha!

Entries.DialogueText: Well, keep it goin'... if you can catch every fish in these waters, I've got a special prize waitin' for ye...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, keep it goin'... if you can catch every fish in these waters, I've got a special prize waitin' for ye...

Entries.DialogueText: Not the fishin' type, eh? That's too bad... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Not the fishin' type, eh? That's too bad...

Entries.DialogueText: Yes, it's a difficult sport... especially for a beginner.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yes, it's a difficult sport... especially for a beginner.

Entries.DialogueText: Have you tried the 'Training Rod'? I sell them right here, at a very low price.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you tried the 'Training Rod'? I sell them right here, at a very low price.

Entries.DialogueText: You should try using a 'Training Rod' until you get a little more experienced.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You should try using a 'Training Rod' until you get a little more experienced.

Entries.DialogueText: Aye... well, business has been tough, lately. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye... well, business has been tough, lately.

Entries.DialogueText: It all started about the same time that old community center fell to ruin... me fish just don't sell like they used to...
Entries.DisplayPattern: It all started about the same that old community center fell to ruin... me fish just don't sell like they used to...

Entries.DialogueText: I've been working double-time just to make ends meet!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been working double- just to make ends meet!

Entries.DialogueText: No time for me own projects... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: No for me own projects...

Entries.DialogueText: But, if things picked back up around here, I might have the time to show ya somethin'...
Entries.DisplayPattern: But, if things picked back up around here, I might have the to show ya somethin'...

Entries.DialogueText: Heh heh... yep. She's back there... an 'old friend' that's seen better days... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heh heh... yep. She's back there... an 'old friend' that's seen better days...

Entries.DialogueText: Some day, lad... you'll see what I mean.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Some day, lad... you'll see what I mean.

Entries.DialogueText: Some day, miss... you'll see what I mean.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Some day, miss... you'll see what I mean.

Entries.DialogueText: Aye... a sad sight, isn't she?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye... a sad sight, isn't she?

Entries.DialogueText: She was me father's boat... Served him well for over 50 years.
Entries.DisplayPattern: She was me father's boat... Served him well for over 50 years.

Entries.DialogueText: But now she can barely stay afloat. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But now she can barely stay afloat.

Entries.DialogueText: I'd repair her myself, but I don't have the right materials, lad.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd repair her myself, but I don't have the right materials, lad.

Entries.DialogueText: I'd repair her myself, but I don't have the right materials, miss.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd repair her myself, but I don't have the right materials, miss.

Entries.DialogueText: Aye... 200 pieces of hardwood to patch the hull would be a good start.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye... 200 pieces of hardwood to patch the hull would be a good start.

Entries.DialogueText: But we'll also need to get the ticket machine back up, and the iridium anchor repaired.
Entries.DisplayPattern: But we'll also need to get the ticket machine back up, and the iridium anchor repaired.

Entries.DialogueText: If I could get me hands on the right materials, and repair the ol' girl... well, then I could take you to the Fern Islands.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If I could get me hands on the right materials, and repair the ol' girl... well, then I could take you to the Fern Islands.

Entries.DialogueText: Volcanic islands full of strange parrots, they say...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Volcanic islands full of strange parrots, they say...

Entries.DialogueText: Aye... I thought you would, lad. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye... I thought you would, lad.

Entries.DialogueText: Aye... I thought you would, miss. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye... I thought you would, miss.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll leave this door unlocked for ya... you can come drop off the materials whenever you like.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll leave this door unlocked for ya... you can come drop off the materials whenever you like.

Entries.DialogueText: Alright, suit yourself... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Alright, suit yourself...

Entries.DialogueText: If you have a change of heart, you can always come back and help out. I'll leave this door unlocked, anyhow.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you have a change of heart, you can always come back and help out. I'll leave this door unlocked, anyhow.

Entries.DialogueText: Aye, lad... Linus lives on the mainland with the rest of us.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye, lad... Linus lives on the mainland with the rest of us.

Entries.DialogueText: After hearing your story... I wanted to help. So, I talked to Linus here and hatched a little plan. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: After hearing your story... I wanted to help. So, I talked to Linus here and hatched a little plan.

Entries.DialogueText: Go on, Linus... tell him.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Go on, Linus... tell him.

Entries.DialogueText: I can take you back for a visit any time! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can take you back for a visit any !

Entries.DialogueText: But, lad.... You can't live here forever...
Entries.DisplayPattern: But, lad.... You can't live here forever...

Entries.DialogueText: You know, there are other children back home, too. I'm sure they'd love to meet ya...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, there are other children back home, too. I'm sure they'd love to meet ya...

Entries.DialogueText: What do you think, {Farmer_Name}?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What do you think, ?

Entries.DialogueText: Poor lad... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Poor lad...

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if there's some way to help... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if there's some way to help...

Entries.DialogueText: Are you setting up a grange display, {Farmer_Name}? It's your chance to show off all the good produce from %farm!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you setting up a grange display, ? It's your chance to show off all the good produce from !

Entries.DialogueText: I managed to catch several iridium-quality beauties, just in time for this year's fair! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I managed to catch several iridium-quality beauties, just in for this year's fair!

Entries.DialogueText: After our grange displays are judged I'll have to try my hand at the fishing game tent. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: After our grange displays are judged I'll have to try my hand at the fishing game tent.

Entries.DialogueText: I'd watch yer back, lad... something terrible's in that maze...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd watch yer back, lad... something terrible's in that maze...

Entries.DialogueText: I'd watch yer back, miss... something terrible's in that maze...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd watch yer back, miss... something terrible's in that maze...

Entries.DialogueText: Sometimes I'll hide an egg too well and no one finds it...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Somes I'll hide an egg too well and no one finds it...

Entries.DialogueText: Well, until summer rolls around. Then the hot air starts to bring out the rotten smell... Hehe. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, until summer rolls around. Then the hot air starts to bring out the rotten smell... Hehe.

Entries.DialogueText: Aye... on rainy days, you'll find catfish in these waters. They're a challenging catch, but well worth the effort!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye... on rainy days, you'll find catfish in these waters. They're a challenging catch, but well worth the effort!

Entries.DialogueText: I should've brought my fishing pole.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I should've brought my fishing pole.

Entries.DialogueText: Aye, these waters be teeming with big fish. Shame I didn't bring me rod! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye, these waters be teeming with big fish. Shame I didn't bring me rod!

Entries.DialogueText: Hi there, {Farmer_Name}. Taking a breather?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi there, . Taking a breather?

Entries.DialogueText: To tell you the truth, I'd rather be fishing right now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: To tell you the truth, I'd rather be fishing right now.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry, I'll be back for the soup... I'm just enjoying a tender moment with me pipe! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry, I'll be back for the soup... I'm just enjoying a tender moment with me pipe!

Entries.DialogueText: Most night-fish would be scared of the light... these are strange ones.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Most night-fish would be scared of the light... these are strange ones.

Entries.DialogueText: It's an old fisherman's rule... if you ever fish up a moonlight jelly, you gotta throw her back into the sea. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's an old fisherman's rule... if you ever fish up a moonlight jelly, you gotta throw her back into the sea.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you want to hear the Legend of the Winter Star?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you want to hear the Legend of the Winter Star?

Entries.DialogueText: In the night sky of winter, there is a bright star only visible from this valley. No one knows why this is... but in times of old people would come from far and wide to see it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: In the night sky of winter, there is a bright star only visible from this valley. No one knows why this is... but in s of old people would come from far and wide to see it.

Entries.DialogueText: They believed that anyone who laid eyes on the Winter Star would be blessed with good fortune. Some even claim that the mysterious fruit known as =Stardrop is connected to the Winter Star in some way.
Entries.DisplayPattern: They believed that anyone who laid eyes on the Winter Star would be blessed with good fortune. Some even claim that the mysterious fruit known as =Stardrop is connected to the Winter Star in some way.

Entries.DialogueText: Suit yourself.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Suit yourself.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm a simple man, {Farmer_Name}... I'm thankful for a solid roof over me head, and a hot can o' beans in the mornin'! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm a simple man, ... I'm thankful for a solid roof over me head, and a hot can o' beans in the mornin'!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}. Ready for some ice fishing?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, . Ready for some ice fishing?

Entries.DialogueText: That's the spirit! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's the spirit!

Entries.DialogueText: We'll see. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: We'll see.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, then think of it as good practice! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, then think of it as good practice!

Entries.DialogueText: Aye, the whole town'll be watchin' our little tournament today. Let's give them all a good show.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Aye, the whole town'll be watchin' our little tournt today. Let's give them all a good show.

Entries.DialogueText: This is great! If only me ol' Pappy was around. He'd go nuts for this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is great! If only me ol' Pappy was around. He'd go nuts for this.

Entries.DialogueText: This looks great. Thank you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: This looks great. Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: Hmmm... You like stuff like this? Huh.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmmm... You like stuff like this? Huh.

Entries.DialogueText: ... *sniff*... Well I guess I can toss it into the chum bucket.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ... *sniff*... Well I guess I can toss it into the chum bucket.

Entries.DialogueText: A gift! Thanks.
Entries.DisplayPattern: A gift! Thanks.

Entries.DialogueText: So I stopped by Willy's the other day and bought {1} {2}. I've never seen one so fresh!
Entries.DisplayPattern: So I stopped by Willy's the other day and bought {1} {2}. I've never seen one so fresh!

Entries.DialogueText: So I cooked it up for dinner last night, and it filled the house with a {3} smell.. It was a hit! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: So I cooked it up for dinner last night, and it filled the house with a {3} smell.. It was a hit!

Entries.DialogueText: He told me you caught it yourself... I'm impressed!
Entries.DisplayPattern: He told me you caught it yourself... I'm impressed!

Entries.DialogueText: Anyways...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Anyways...

Entries.DialogueText: So I stopped by Willy's the other day and bought {1} {2}. He said you caught it yourself!
Entries.DisplayPattern: So I stopped by Willy's the other day and bought {1} {2}. He said you caught it yourself!

Entries.DialogueText: I cooked it up for dinner last night... and, uh... It filled the house with a {3} odor. I don't even want to know where you found that thing... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I cooked it up for dinner last night... and, uh... It filled the house with a {3} odor. I don't even want to know where you found that thing...

Entries.DialogueText: Anyways...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Anyways...

Entries.DialogueText: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the fish shop the other day? I think I bought it...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the fish shop the other day? I think I bought it...

Entries.DialogueText: It was pretty high-quality stuff. I'm impressed.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It was pretty high-quality stuff. I'm impressed.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the fish shop the other day? I think I bought it...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the fish shop the other day? I think I bought it...

Entries.DialogueText: It was pretty high-quality stuff. Very firm meat.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It was pretty high-quality stuff. Very firm meat.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the general store the other day? I think I bought it...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the general store the other day? I think I bought it...

Entries.DialogueText: It smelled kind of fishy, but it was alright.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It smelled kind of fishy, but it was alright.

Entries.DialogueText: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on a 'chum-bucket' sale for only {3}g.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on a 'chum-bucket' sale for only {3}g.

Entries.DialogueText: It was {4}! No wonder Willy was practically giving that {5} away...
Entries.DisplayPattern: It was {4}! No wonder Willy was practically giving that {5} away...

Entries.DialogueText: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only {3}g.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only {3}g.

Entries.DialogueText: It was actually pretty {4}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It was actually pretty {4}.

Entries.DialogueText: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only {3}g.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only {3}g.

Entries.DialogueText: I couldn't pass up that great price.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I couldn't pass up that great price.

Entries.DialogueText: So I was at Willy's other day and he showed me {1} {2} you brought in.
Entries.DisplayPattern: So I was at Willy's other day and he showed me {1} {2} you brought in.

Entries.DialogueText: I cooked it up for dinner with some lemon and a side of rice pilaf. Pretty good! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I cooked it up for dinner with some lemon and a side of rice pilaf. Pretty good!

Entries.DialogueText: Ahoy... you know that {2} you sold me the other day? Well, I sizzled it up in me cabin last night...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ahoy... you know that {2} you sold me the other day? Well, I sizzled it up in me cabin last night...

Entries.DialogueText: T'was the mealiest fish I've ever set me gums on... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: T'was the mealiest fish I've ever set me gums on...

Entries.DialogueText: Ahoy! Remember that {2} you brought in the other day? Well, I sizzled it up in me cabin last night...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ahoy! Remember that {2} you brought in the other day? Well, I sizzled it up in me cabin last night...

Entries.DialogueText: T'was the finest fish I've had since I was a wee lad! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: T'was the finest fish I've had since I was a wee lad!

Entries.DialogueText: Are you okay? I found you washed up on the shore, lad. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you okay? I found you washed up on the shore, lad.

Entries.DialogueText: Are you okay? I found you washed up on the shore, miss. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you okay? I found you washed up on the shore, miss.

Entries.DialogueText: You really had me worried... I thought you were a goner! Be a little more careful out there... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You really had me worried... I thought you were a goner! Be a little more careful out there...

Entries.DialogueText: The island can be a dangerous place.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The island can be a dangerous .

Entries.DialogueText: Hehe... I'd never turn down a free movie!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hehe... I'd never turn down a free movie!

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, that reminds me of a story me ol' Pops used to tell...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, that reminds me of a story me ol' Pops used to tell...

Entries.DialogueText: After a while, you get a feel for the squid's behavior. You can tell when one's on the line before you even see it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: After a while, you get a feel for the squid's behavior. You can tell when one's on the line before you even see it.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, nothing like the smell o' grilled shrimp on a warm day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, nothing like the smell o' grilled shrimp on a warm day.

Entries.DialogueText: Willy's Challenge: Catch 3 Sandfish.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Willy's Challenge: Catch 3 Sandfish.

Entries.DialogueText: Willy's Challenge
Entries.DisplayPattern: Willy's Challenge

Entries.DialogueText: Willy has challenged you to catch 3 Sandfish.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Willy has challenged you to catch 3 Sandfish.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, you got 'em. An exciting catch, aren't they?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, you got 'em. An exciting catch, aren't they?

Entries.DialogueText: Here's 25 Calico Eggs for your reward.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here's 25 Calico Eggs for your reward.

Entries.DialogueText: Willy has challenged you to catch a Scorpion Carp.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Willy has challenged you to catch a Scorpion Carp.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, you did it. A challenging catch, don't you think?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, you did it. A challenging catch, don't you think?

Entries.DialogueText: Here's 50 Calico Eggs for your reward.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here's 50 Calico Eggs for your reward.

Entries.DialogueText: Willy has challenged you to find a "Golden Bobber".
Entries.DisplayPattern: Willy has challenged you to find a "Golden Bobber".

Entries.DialogueText: Well, if it isn't me favorite golden bobber!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, if it isn't me golden bobber!

Entries.DialogueText: And it only smells mild o' fish... Heh heh. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: And it only smells mild o' fish... Heh heh.

Entries.DialogueText: Here's 30 Calico Eggs for your reward.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here's 30 Calico Eggs for your reward.

Entries.DialogueText: Willy's Challenge: Catch a Scorpion Carp.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Willy's Challenge: Catch a Scorpion Carp.

Entries.DialogueText: Willy: A fish swallowed me rare golden bobber! There's 30 eggs for whoever returns it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Willy: A fish swallowed me rare golden bobber! There's 30 eggs for whoever returns it.

Entries.DialogueText: Find and return Willy's Golden Bobber.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Find and return Willy's Golden Bobber.
